wikipedia_page.main: Neeta Madahar (born 1966) is a British artist who specialises in photography of nature, birds, and flora. She has had solo exhibitions in Canada, Barcelona, Berlin, Boston, France, London, and New York  and had a book, Flora, published by Nazraeli Press. She was named as one of the UK's 50 most significant contemporary photographers in an issue of Portfolio Magazine.Some of her well appreciated series of photographs are "Sustenance" (2003), "Flora" on flowers "as props for the subjects who are her female friends", "Falling" (2005) of the sky, and "Cosmoses" (2005–07) comprising pictures of flowers shown like stars falling from the sky.

response: * Neeta Madahar (born 1966), artistic photographer specialising in nature, birds and flora
